### Steps to reproduce the issue

The command
```
spack install openmpi @master
```
leads to the build error
```
1 error found in build log:
     1843    checking for pandoc... no
     1844    configure: WARNING: *** Could not find a suitable pandoc on your system.
     1845    configure: WARNING: *** You need pandoc >=1.12 to build Open MPI with man pages.
     1846    configure: WARNING: *** If no man pages are needed, rerun configure with option '--disable-man-pages'.
     1847    configure: WARNING: *** NOTE: If you are building from a tarball downloaded from www.open-mpi.org, you do not need Pan
             doc.
     1848    configure: WARNING: *** See pandoc.org.
  >> 1849    configure: error: Cannot continue
```


### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3831-53ac4c89ff
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-cascadelake
* **Concretizer:** original
```


### Additional information

[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6948459/spack-build-out.txt)
